title: Total number of gang-related homicides in the United States 2012
summary: Overall Total number of homicides has decreased over the Year.
Total number of homicides is slightly decreasing from 2009 to 2010.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2009 and 2010.
Maximum Total number of homicides, about 2083.0 was reported at Year 2009
Minimum Total number of homicides about 2020.0 was reached at Year 2010
